Chronicle Purgo

Latin for Cleaning Log?

Visit the website

About this project

A fullstack app created using a Node.jS/Express backend. A user can create a card which displays a date stamp and a location or event. Much like a to do list this app tracks the time an action was last performed. A user clicks the card and the time is update. There is also a pulldown which displays the average per week for each room an action is performed. The data is saved on a Mongo DB database. The User interface utilizes only Html/CSS and javascript with no frameworks.

Technical Sheet

Core technologies I used to on this website:

  • Javascript
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Node.js
  • Express
  • MongoDB
